dashboard.title: Dashboard

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.noteStopTimer: Starting this task will automatically stop any currently running timer.
tasks.noPermissionDelete: You do not have permission to delete tasks. Only HR and Managers can delete tasks.
tasks.confirmDeleteTask:
Are you sure you want to delete the task "{taskTitle}"?

This action will permanently delete the task and all its time entries. This cannot be undone.
tasks.taskDeletedSuccess: Task "{taskTitle}" has been deleted successfully along with {count} time entries.
tasks.failedDeleteTryAgain: Failed to delete task. Please try again.
tasks.manageYourTasks: Manage your tasks and track progress
tasks.searchTasksPlaceholder: Search by task title or description...
tasks.searchTasksAdvancedPlaceholder: Search by title, description, or time (e.g. '2h', '30min', '>1h', '<45min')...
tasks.createFirstTaskDesc: Create your first task to get started with time tracking.
tasks.noPermissionToDelete: You do not have permission to delete tasks. Only HR and Managers can delete tasks.
tasks.deleteTaskConfirmationStart: Are you sure you want to delete the task
tasks.deleteTaskConfirmationWarning: This action will permanently delete the task and all its time entries. This cannot be undone.
tasks.taskDeletedSuccessfullyEnd: has been deleted successfully along with
tasks.failedToDeleteTaskMessage: Failed to delete task. Please try again.

timeEntries.viewTimeEntries: View all your time entries and track your productivity.
timeEntries.leaveEmptyExport: Leave empty to export all time entries

timeEntries.deleteTimeEntryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this time entry?
timeEntries.failedToDeleteEntry: Failed to delete time entry. Please try again.
timeEntries.failedToExport: Failed to export data. Please try again.

timeEntries.searchTimeEntriesAdvancedPlaceholder: Search by title, description, time, or date (e.g. 'today', 'yesterday', '2h', '>30min')...
